pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Assessing Clustering // A set of tools for evaluating clustering similarity across methods and method stability using element-centric clustering comparison (Gates et al. (2019) doi:10.1038/s41598-019-44892-y). Additionally, this package enables data-wide assessment of clustering robustness using proportion of ambiguously clustered pairs (Senbabaoglu et al. (2014) doi:10.1038/srep06207), which can be used to infer the optimal number of clusters in the data.
